        Returns:

      • isValidSMTPConfiguration

        public static boolean isValidSMTPConfiguration(java.lang.String address,
                                               int port,
                                               java.lang.String email,
                                               byte[] password)
        Tests if a given SMTP configuration is valid. It will validate addresses and the port. Then it will test connectivity of the SMTP address. Lastly, it will AUTH to SMTP server and ensure the information is good.
        Parameters:
        address - the SMTP address
        port - the SMTP port
        email - the email address
        password - the email address password
        Returns:
        if the AUTH was successful

      • isValidSMTPConfiguration

        public static boolean isValidSMTPConfiguration(java.lang.String address,
                                               int port,
                                               java.lang.String email,
                                               byte[] password,
                                               boolean notify)
        Tests if a given SMTP configuration is valid. It will validate addresses and the port. Then it will test connectivity of the smtp address. Lastly, it will AUTH to smtp server and ensure the information is good.
        Parameters:
        address - the SMTP address
        port - the SMTP port
        email - the email address
        password - the email address password
        notify - if popup dialogs will appear carrying the servers unsuccessful response message
        Returns:
        if the AUTH was successful
